targets.expr: sum(trivy_vulnerability_id{vuln_id=~"CVE.*", namespace=~"$namespace", cluster=~"$cluster"}) by (namespace, image_repository, image_tag, vuln_id, severity)

sum(trivy_rbacassessments_info{namespace=~"$namespace", cluster=~"$cluster"}) by (namespace, severity, rbac_assessment_category, rbac_assessment_description, rbac_assessment_id, resource_kind, resource_name)

sum(trivy_exposedsecrets_info{namespace=~"$namespace", cluster=~"$cluster"}) by (namespace, image_repository, image_tag, vuln_id, severity, secret_category, secret_rule_id, secret_target, secret_title)
